title: breaking an expression using a local variable changes the result
body:
by **paurea**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Running the program attached

The first matrix is different than the second and should be the same

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
The bug can be reproduced under MacOs and Linux
$GOOS is linux (I also reproduced it in MacOs with GOOS set to darwin)
$GOARCH is 386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

for linux:
bf97228a8786 tip

for MacOs:
17ded5ad443b+ release.2010-05-04/release
Attachments: 1. hello.go (958 bytes)
